- Remove ad at startup

This major update includes:
- Auto resize board to take advantage of whole screen
- Auto scrolling board feature now can be optionally enabled/disable
- Various UI and layout optimizations
- Share your results via email and social networks
- Hint feature to open any square at any time
- Change app's name and icon
- Now natively support and run on all iOS devices
- Various bug fixes and improvements

- Add SUPER HARD level
- Fix issue which does not visually update rewarded hint
- Fix restoring in-app issue that may freeze the game for some users
- Some other minor tweaks

- Now allow playing iTunes music while playing game
- Exclude unnecessary files from backing up into iCloud
- Several tweaks and improvements

- Change banner ads for better matching with the game UI
- Upgrade components into latest versions

This new major version 3.2.0 includes:

- Supports iPhone X
- Supports auto save and load
- Adds phone vibration when bombs exploded
- Improves UI to make playing field bigger
- Improves hint system
- Improves slow UI for some time
- Massive component upgrade
- Various bug fixes and minor improvements

If you like the game, please support us by giving us comments or rating it. Thank you.

What's new in this version:

- Fixes crashing bug which occurs right after purchasing an item is finished
- In flagging mode, tapping on an opened square will now open the surroundings instead of doing nothing as before. This will help massively speed up game play.
- Adds preview video on the product page
- Fixes Game Center leaderboard not showing
- Gives free hints at the first time run instead of tapping on the hint button as before
- Fixes incorrect PRO version download link
- Several bug fixes and minor improvements
